prompts: Create a prehistoric Pokemon that resembles a small armored creature with a unique shell.

Generate a fossil Pokemon with a smooth rounded body and distinctive eye shapes.

Imagine a small Pokemon with a brown shell and a black face that thrives in caves.
Design a Pokemon that resembles an ancient creature and has a unique battle style.
Show me a Kabuto-inspired Pokemon with features that highlight its prehistoric nature.
